doc.after: Air France lounges are known as Le Salon, and are open to La PremiÃ¨re, Business, and Premium Economy passengers, as well as Flying Blue Gold, Flying Blue Platinum, SkyTeam Elite and Elite Plus members. The Air France salon offer a buffet and beverages, international newspapers, free WIFI, computers with internet access, restrooms, shower facilities, and a Clarins Spa. There are four salons at Paris-Charles De Gaulle, Le Salon La PremiÃ¨re and Le Salon in terminals 2C (arrivals), 2E, 2F, and 2G. Worldwide, there are 530 Air France and Skyteam lounges in 300 international airports on every continent except Antarctica.[122]
